definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [c. num. masc.], Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 93 changes gender of num. in all, or regards as irregular agreement in gender (Ges:§ 97 c); otherwise Kö:ii. 1, 61, 176);—abs. ´[[ק]]: Ex 25:19 + ; pl. cstr. [[קְחוֹת]] 1Ki 12:31 + ; sf. [[קְחוֹתיו]] Ex 27:4 + (so also Ex 37:8, Ex 39:4 Qr; Kt [[קחוותו]], cf. [[קְחָת]] infr.), etc.;—

end, sg. of [[כַּפּׂרֶת]] in tabern. Ex 25:19, Ex 25:19 = Ex 37:8, Ex 37:8; of curtain Ex 26:4 = Ex 36:11; elsewh. pl., [[הַכַּפּׂרֶת]] ´[[ק]]: Ex 25:18 = Ex 37:7, cf. Ex 25:19 = Ex 37:8; of ephod Ex 28:7 = Ex 39:4, breast-plate Ex 28:23, Ex 28:24, Ex 28:26 = Ex 39:16, Ex 39:17, Ex 39:19, chins Ex 28:25 = Ex 39:18, grating Ex 27:4 (appar. = corners); tips of wings 1Ki 6:24, 1Ki 6:24; of vine Ez Eze 15:4; [[הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[ק]]: ends of the earth Is 40:28, Is 41:5, Is 41:9, Job 28:24; [[הַשָּׁמַיִם]] ´[[אַרְבַּע ק]]: Je 49:36, cf. Ps 19:7; [[דְּרָכָיו]] ´[[ק]]: Job 26:14, i.e. the mere edge, minute part, of his doings.
[[מִקְחוֹת הָעָם]] = from the whole of (fr. among) the people, 1Ki 12:31, 1Ki 13:33, cf. Ju Jdg 18:2, 2Ki 17:32 (v. also Sir 16:17, and [[קָחֶךְ]]
